SummaryEnglish: The story takes place in the world of Remnant, which is filled with supernatural forces and shadowy creatures known as the "Creatures of Grimm." Prior to the events of the series, mankind waged a battle of survival against the Grimm before discovering the power of a mysterious element called Dust, which allowed them to fight back against the monsters. In the present day, Dust is used to power magical abilities and weapons. Those who use these abilities to battle the Grimm are known as Huntsmen or Huntresses.The series focuses on four girls, each with her own unique weapon and powers. Together, they form team RWBY at Beacon Academy in the city of Vale, where they are trained to become Huntresses alongside team CRDL (pronounced "cardinal"), team JNPR (pronounced "juniper"), team SSSN (pronounced "sun") and team CFVY (pronounced "coffee").

5.SummaryEnglish: The RWBY panel at RTX 2013. https://youtu.be/SoJzEb7qH28 and https://youtu.be/D8o4neUbtcc

6.SummaryEnglish: RWBY Art Panel at RTX 2013. https://youtu.be/3SUbkBoMZp4

7.SummaryEnglish: RWBY RTX 2013 Panel Preview, shot and compiled after the panel. Watch Monty and the gang as they take questions and chat about the new upcoming series from Rooster Teeth. https://youtu.be/IqaPg_9iTUc

9.TitleEnglish: Behind the Scenes of RWBY Cosplay! (Highlights)
9.SummaryEnglish: Watch the RWBY Cosplayers talk about the show, their involvement with RWBY, and the characters they enact. https://roosterteeth.com/watch/rwby-bonus-1 https://youtu.be/9wCBvBfCwyg

10.SummaryEnglish: RWBY Panel Q&A from the 2013 New York Comic Con. https://youtu.be/WuIpWgXHAZ0

11.SummaryEnglish: RWBY Crew Chat Live Stream. 4:26 - Blake is the hardest character to write for 5:34 - Where the idea for RWBY came from 9:02 - Monty flat out says this was not just his vision, but Miles/Kerry's as well. 20:18 - Yang's bike is named Bumblebee, but it had another word before it in the name and Miles forgot. https://youtu.be/_wU_dQEj7uc

12.SummaryEnglish: Return to the world of RWBY as the cast and crew share how the show is made! In this first diary, the gang catches you up on pre-production and announces the winner of the Velvet Battle Gear Design Contest.

13.SummaryEnglish: Return to the world of RWBY as the cast and crew share how the show is made! In this second diary, we follow the concept art and modeling phases, and take a peek at how Velvet's new look has evolved.

14.SummaryEnglish: Return to the world of RWBY as the cast and crew share how the show is made! In this third diary, discover how the characters of RWBY come to life through voice acting and animation.

15.SummaryEnglish: Return to the world of RWBY as the cast and crew share how the show is made! In this new journal, explore post-production on the show through render, VFX and sound!

16.SummaryEnglish: Recording of the RWBY Panel at RTX 2014.

17.SummaryEnglish: The producers and animators of the hit animated series RWBY discuss the first four episodes of Season 2.

18.SummaryEnglish: The first episode of a supplementary series looking at the history and lore of Remnant. This episode delves into the mysterious power of Dust Crystals.

19.SummaryEnglish: Brief overview of human civilization on Remnant: the names and locations of the four standing kingdoms, their basic government and military organization, the purpose of huntsmen academies, and a grim portrait of life outside the kingdoms.

20.SummaryEnglish: The third episode of a supplementary series looking at the history and lore of Remnant. This episode examines the horrific creatures of Grimm.

21.SummaryEnglish: This episode examines the powerful effects of Aura, a powerful force that can be wielded by all living creatures for both defence and offence. This episode was a DVD/Blu-Ray exclusive

22.TitleEnglish: World of Remnant: Vytal Festival Tournament
22.SummaryEnglish: The episode gives a brief overview and explanation of the Vytal Festival, including its post-war origins, its locations around Remnant, along with a description of the Vytal Festival Tournament and its levitating stadium.

23.SummaryEnglish: Ozpin explains a huntress or a huntman's duties and choices.

24.TitleEnglish: World of Remnant: Cross Continental Transmit System
24.SummaryEnglish: This episode covers the history and capabilities of the Cross Continental Transmit System, the vital wireless communication network that allows the Kingdoms to communicate with one another.

25.TitleEnglish: World of Remnant: The Four Maidens
25.SummaryEnglish: For many years, an old wizard has lived alone in his home in the woods. One snowy day, he is surprised to see a young maiden outside his window, who introduces herself as Winter, and she was waiting for her other sisters to arrive. The old man, curious as to why she was resting under a tree, decides to rest himself as well. When the old man wakes, he sees Winter is visited by another sister named Spring, who begins planting seeds and watering a garden for the old man. Later on, they are joined by the third sister, Summer, who convinces the old man to step outside his door and embrace the world around him. As they prepare for dinner, the fourth and eldest sister, Fall, arrives to join them. The old man then asks the sisters why they decided to help him, and Fall replies it is because they are able to. In return for their kindness, the wizard musters all of the power he can, and offers it to the four sisters, granting them unique abilities. The Four Maidens are grateful to the old man and set off to share their gifts with the world, promising him that they will visit him again on a yearly basis.

26.SummaryEnglish: It's been several months since the Fall of Beacon, and the world of Remnant is still recovering. Tensions are high, lives have been lost, and the members of Team RWBY... are divided. Each of our heroines now faces a journey of their own.

27.TitleEnglish: Volumes 1-3 Recap: The Story So Far
27.SummaryEnglish: Catch up with Ruby, Weiss, Blake, and Yang and the story of their journey to become protectors of the world of Remnant.

34.TitleEnglish: World of Remnant: Schnee Dust Company

35.TitleEnglish: World of Remnant: The Great War
35.SummaryEnglish: The Great War was a terrible time in Remnant... but it's a time that should never be forgotten.

36.SummaryEnglish: All her life, Weiss Schnee has lived a privileged and pampered life... but it did not come without its own hardships.

37.SummaryEnglish: The White Fang was once a peaceful organization fighting for true equality for the Faunus. Over the years, however, many members began to favor violent and extreme tactics in order to demand respect from the humans of Remnant. Though Blake Belladonna eventually decided to leave the White Fang and its growing acts of terror, not all of her friends made the same decision.

38.SummaryEnglish: You know that Ruby is unstoppable with her scythe, but Yang knows the true power of hand-to-hand combat. In the midst of a weapon-free training session, can Yang convince her sister of the importance of fighting without a weapon?

39.SummaryEnglish: Willing to strike down anyone who gets in the way of his twisted version of justice, Adam has declared to fight for the rights of his people, but over the years he's strayed further and further from these idealistic claims. He's a dangerous combination of ferocity and delusion whose only goal is to torment his ex-partner, Blake Belladonna, whom he considers to be responsible for his fall from power.

40.TitleEnglish: Let's Make a Show: The Legacy of RWBY
40.SummaryEnglish: In this sneak peek at the Blu-Ray extra features, join the cast and crew as they talk about how RWBY was first created and how it has evolved over the past three volumes.

41.SummaryEnglish: In this sneak peek at the DVD/Blu-Ray extra features, join the cast and crew as they explore the Journey of team RWBY and how the experience has affected the characters and the artist who create the show

42.SummaryEnglish: A look back at the first five volumes of RWBY.

43.SummaryEnglish: Join Miles, Yssa, and friends for a live RWBY Volume 7 hype spectacular!

49.SummaryEnglish: Welcome to the world of Remnant! Please enjoy the original opening animation of RWBY Volume 1, now "clean," without the credit text overlays.

50.SummaryEnglish: Team RWBY is back to take on the evil lurking in the world of Remnant! RWBY Volume 2 will debut this July at Rooster Teeth's RTX Convention ( http://rtxevent.com ), followed by its online premiere. The single of the opening title song "Time To Say Goodbye" by Jeff Williams featuring Casey Lee Williams is available at iTunes and other digital music services: http://bit.ly/1i7Zd6P

51.SummaryEnglish: This sneak peek at the opening title sequence animation for RWBY Volume 3 features new track “When It Falls,” by Jeff Williams featuring Casey Lee Williams!

57.SummaryEnglish: Join the ladies of Rooster Teeth for a special podcast devoted to RWBY Volume 1. Featuring RWBY voice actors: Lindsay Tuggey (Ruby Rose), Arryn Zech (Blake Belladonna), Barbara Dunkelman (Yang Xiao Long), and Kara Eberle (Weiss Schnee.) Recorded on November 14, 2013.

60.SummaryEnglish: Includes 12 tracks scored by Jeff Williams, Alex Abraham, and Steve Goldshein, and 11 songs by Jeff Williams featuring vocals by Casey Lee Williams!

62.SummaryEnglish: Beacon has fallen and Team RWBY is divided. As greater catastrophe draws near, Ruby, Weiss, Blake, and Yang each face their own separate journey in search of answers.

64.SummaryEnglish: Ruby, Weiss, Blake, and Yang are each entangled in journeys of their own, but they all share one destination: Haven Academy. Whether it's the promise of ancient relics, mystical maidens, or simply more power, it's clear that the stage for the next great battle for Remnant has been chosen. The question is, with so many players in this game, who's going to come out on top?

65.SummaryEnglish: A behind the scenes look at RWBY Volume 1.

66.SummaryEnglish: A montage of fan art presented by Miles Luna, Kerry Shawcross, and Patrick Rodriguez.

67.SummaryEnglish: Volume 1 Episode 1 with the story board overlaid.

68.SummaryEnglish: Volume 2 Episode 1 with the story board overlaid.

69.SummaryEnglish: A behind the scenes look at RWBY Volume 5.

70.SummaryEnglish: A behind the scenes look at Volume 4 of RWBY.

74.TitleEnglish: Volume 1: Ursa Music Video Easter Egg
74.SummaryEnglish: Included as a hidden feature in Volume 1, "That's A Big Ursa!" is a song from the American animated webseries RWBY; more specifically, it is a remix of some of Russel Thrush's dialogue regarding a massive Ursa Major Grimm, with the song's music video featuring Russel and two Ursai dancing in Junior Xiong's Club.

76.SummaryEnglish: Behind the scenes video describing the fights of RWBY

77.SummaryEnglish: Overview of RWBY, specifically an overview of the Grimm.

82.SummaryEnglish: Behind the scenes of the production of Volume 6.

83.SummaryEnglish: Animatic & Final version of Volume 6, Chapter 3, side by side.

84.SummaryEnglish: Animatic & Final Export of Chapter 7, side by side.

87.SummaryEnglish: A young hero, an exalted heiress, a troubled rogue, and a party girl- These are the four members of RWBY, a team brought together and trained for the sole purpose of combating the rampant evils that plague the fantastic world of Remnant. If these four girls want to graduate Beacon Academy they'll have to learn to work together both on the battlefield and in the classroom.

88.SummaryEnglish: Team RWBY is back and ready for their second semester at Beacon, but real life doesn't stop there. Between classes and homework, they still have to find time to save the world. And between the White Fang, Roman Torchwick, and a mysterious new trio, they certainly have their work cut out for them!

89.SummaryEnglish: The Vytal Festival Tournament is the ultimate battle of skill, pitting the world's most powerful Huntsmen and Huntresses in training against one another... and it's finally here! Ruby, Weiss, Blake, and Yang are back for a season of over-the-top action, and they're not alone. New fighters from around Remnant are ready to bring glory to their kingdom, but there are those among them with a far more sinister goal in mind.

90.SummaryEnglish: The Vytal Tournament is in full-swing and Team RWBY is not alone. Newcomers have really begun to shake things up as the shape-shifting arena pushes everyone to their limits. Will Ruby, Weiss, Blake, and Yang make it to the grand finales? And what do Cinder and her crew of evil-doers have in-store for Beacon Academy?

91.SummaryEnglish: It's been several months since the Fall of Beacon, and the world of Remnant is still recovering. Tensions are high, lives have been lost, and the members of Team RWBY... are divided. Each of our heroines now faces a journey of their own.

92.SummaryEnglish: While some students must search inward if they ever hope to move on, others will venture out into the world in search of answers. Alongside the remaining members of Team JNPR, Ruby Rose has begun the long trek to the kingdom of Mistral, but the road ahead is full of surprises. New friends and enemies await while the threat of an even larger catastrophe draws near.

93.SummaryEnglish: Ruby, Weiss, Blake, and Yang are each entangled in journeys of their own, but they all share one destination: Haven Academy.

94.SummaryEnglish: Whether it's the promise of ancient relics, mystical maidens, or simply more power, it's clear that the stage for the next great battle for Remnant has been chosen. The question is, with so many players in this game, who's going to come out on top?

97.SummaryEnglish: The Junior Detectives take on their toughest case yet...

98.SummaryEnglish: RWBY: Combat Ready is a cooperative board game where you and your friends join forces to take on infamous RWBY villains & slay monstrous Grimm!

99.TitleEnglish: RWBY: Combat Ready - How to Play
99.SummaryEnglish: Join CEO of Arcane Wonders Bryan Pope as he teaches Miles, Lindsay, Chelsea, and Gray how to play RWBY: Combat Ready!

100.SummaryEnglish: Eric gets us all up to speed on RWBY Volume 7, while sharing a small clip of Chapter 9.

101.SummaryEnglish: The Cast and Crew of RWBY Volume 8 takes you through Episode One: Divide and answers your questions via chat!

102.SummaryEnglish: Join the ladies of Rooster Teeth for a special podcast devoted to RWBY Volume 1. Featuring RWBY voice actors: Lindsay Tuggey (Ruby Rose), Arryn Zech (Blake Belladonna), Barbara Dunkelman (Yang Xiao Long), and Kara Eberle (Weiss Schnee.) Recorded on November 14, 2013.

103.SummaryEnglish: First look at Rooster Teeth's newest project RWBY helmed by Red vs. Blue Lead Animator Monty Oum.

104.SummaryEnglish: The second trailer for the new animated show RWBY from Rooster Teeth.

105.SummaryEnglish: Third look at Rooster Teeth's newest project RWBY helmed by Red vs. Blue Lead Animator Monty Oum. See the premiere at RTX 2013!

106.SummaryEnglish: Get the Music on iTunes, Google Play, or Amazon Mp3Fourth look at Rooster Teeth's newest project RWBY helmed by Red vs. Blue Lead Animator Monty Oum. See the premiere at RTX 2013!

107.TitleEnglish: RWBY Beyond E2: A Knight’s Journal
107.SummaryEnglish: Jaune tries to develop a new perspective.

108.TitleEnglish: RWBY Beyond E3: The Adventures of Somewhat
108.SummaryEnglish: Somewhat is given an important new purpose.

109.SummaryEnglish: Yang plans a surprise outing for Ruby.

110.SummaryEnglish: An introspective look back on the first 10 years of RWBY with some of the cast and crew that helped bring it to life.

111.TitleEnglish: Justice League x Rwby: Super Heroes and Huntsmen Part One
111.SummaryEnglish: Members of the Justice League are transported to the world of Remnant and find themselves turned into teenagers. The Remnant heroes combine forces with the Justice League to uncover why their planet has been mysteriously altered.

112.TitleEnglish: Justice League x Rwby: Super Heroes and Huntsmen Part Two
112.SummaryEnglish: After their adventure in Remnant cyberspace, courtesy of Kilg%re, the Justice League return to Earth. However, they find the Grimm have followed them and are somehow duplicating their powers. Bringing Black Canary up to speed, the League is forced to seek out Team RWBY for help.

113.TitleEnglish: RWBY Fairy Tales: The Grimm Child
113.SummaryEnglish: Grimm are walking horrors that roam the wilderness... but there are some that bring the terror closer to home.

114.TitleEnglish: RWBY Fairy Tales: The Hunter's Child
114.SummaryEnglish: A lone hunter protects a swampy village until disaster strikes. Will his children pick up the mantle?

115.TitleEnglish: RWBY Fairy Tales: The Shallow Sea
115.SummaryEnglish: Ozpin recounts two distinct origin myths regarding the Faunus.

116.TitleEnglish: RWBY Fairy Tales: The Indecisive King
116.SummaryEnglish: A kingly gift turns out to be more than it seems.

117.TitleEnglish: RWBY Fairy Tales: The Girl in the Tower
117.SummaryEnglish: Not every story has a "happily ever after."

118.TitleEnglish: RWBY Fairy Tales: The Warrior in the Woods
118.SummaryEnglish: A young boy meets a mysterious warrior protecting his village from afar.

1.SummaryEnglish: Ruby Rose finds herself in the middle of a robbery committed by famous criminal Roman Torchwick. Her efforts to stop him attract the attention of Professor Ozpin, head of Beacon Academy.

2.SummaryEnglish: Ruby makes a new friend, the bumbling swordsman Jaune Arc, during her overwhelming first day at Beacon.

3.SummaryEnglish: Jaune makes the mistake of flirting with Weiss but finds a friend in star athlete Pyrrha Nikos, while Ruby is horrified to learn the details of Beacon's initiation ritual.

4.SummaryEnglish: After (literally) dropping into the vast Emerald Forest, Ruby and the other initiates scramble to find their new partners and survive against the vicious creatures of Grimm. Welcome to school, kids!

5.SummaryEnglish: To their mutual displeasure, Ruby and Weiss are paired up during the initiation. Meanwhile Pyrhha lends a hand to Jaune, who may be in over his head at Beacon.

6.SummaryEnglish: Yang and Blake happily partner up, while tensions rise between Ruby and Weiss.

7.SummaryEnglish: Things are going smoothly for Blake and Yang, but everything goes south when the other pairs show up with giant monsters on their tails.

8.SummaryEnglish: Ruby, Weiss, Blake, Yang, Jaune, Pyrrha, and fellow students Nora and Ren fight for their lives against the monstrous inhabitants of the Emerald Forest in their first true test as Huntsmen and Huntresses.

9.SummaryEnglish: The teams have been formed and classes at Beacon have begun, but Weiss can't understand why Ruby was put in charge of RWBY instead of her. Does the young prodigy really have what it takes to lead?

10.SummaryEnglish: While Weiss struggles with her pride, Ruby begins to really wonder if the headmaster made a mistake in making her leader of team RWBY.

11.SummaryEnglish: Jaune, the least-capable of the new Hunters, suffers under a bully.

12.SummaryEnglish: Pyrrha comes up with a plan to help Jaune, but things get complicated when he reveals how he came to the school.

13.SummaryEnglish: Jaune is being blackmailed into one terrible situation after another, but when Pyrrha becomes the target of a mean prank, he stands up to his tormentors.

14.SummaryEnglish: Resolving the "Jaune Arc", Jaune shows everyone that he truly has potential. But can he still repair his friendship with Pyrrha?

15.SummaryEnglish: Two new contenders come to town in anticipation of the coming tournament. Blake and Weiss clash over prejudices concerning the faunus.

16.SummaryEnglish: After Blake ran away, the rest team RWBY searches for her. Meanwhile Blake and a new friend attempt to find out who's behind a series of thefts.

1.SummaryEnglish: A new semester at Beacon begins in a messy way as teams RWBY and JNPR go at it in a knockdown, drag-out food fight. Meanwhile, sinister forces gather, ready to strike at an unsuspecting kingdom.

2.SummaryEnglish: Blake, restless ever since her encounter with Torchwick, convinces the rest of team RWBY to help her hunt down the elusive criminal.

3.SummaryEnglish: RWBY is joined by Sun and Neptune in their hunt for Torchwick. While scouring the town for clues, Ruby bumps into her friend Penny, who's been behaving even more strangely than usual.

4.SummaryEnglish: Blake and Sun find Torchwick supplying advanced armaments to a group of radicals, but are discovered before they can escape. All of team RWBY must unite to defeat their enemy's newest weapon.

5.SummaryEnglish: Pyrrha Nikos is one of the most promising new Huntresses at Beacon, called "the Invincible Girl" for good reason. But when it comes to matters of the heart Pyrrha's much more vulnerable than she lets on.

6.SummaryEnglish: Blake is running herself ragged trying to figure out Torchwick's next move, and Yang tries to get her to relax a bit and enjoy the upcoming dance. Pyrrha and Jaune both deal with unrequited love.

7.SummaryEnglish: Jaune starts to realize how Pyrrha feels about him, and makes a bold move. Ruby notices something amiss outside the dance, and decides to investigate.

8.SummaryEnglish: The first year students receive their first real missions as Huntsmen and Huntresses as Ozpin and his allies seek a way to counter their mysterious foe.

9.SummaryEnglish: Accompanied by the eccentric Huntsman Dr. Oobleck, team RWBY battles the Grimm in an abandoned part of the city, all while secretly searching for Torchwick's hideout.

10.SummaryEnglish: Weiss, Blake and Yang contemplate why they want to become Huntresses, while Ruby makes a startling discover deep underground.

11.SummaryEnglish: Team RWBY fights against the clock to stop a train from reaching its destination.

12.SummaryEnglish: Hundreds of Grimm pour into the city and team RWBY alone cannot stop them. As Cinder's carefully laid schemes are in danger of coming apart, she searches for a way to salvage the situation.

1.SummaryEnglish: In the Vytal Festival Tournament, Team RWBY fights their first round against Haven's Team ABRN.

2.SummaryEnglish: Team JNPR fights against Shade's Team BRNZ. Later, Team SSSN of Haven, Sun and Neptune's team, fight against Shade's all-female Team NDGO.

3.SummaryEnglish: Winter Schnee, Weiss' stern older sister, arrives at Beacon and battles Qrow Branwen. Meanwhile, Cinder continues to build upon her ultimate scheme.

4.SummaryEnglish: Emerald and Mercury go toe to toe with Coco and Yatsuhashi of team CFVY. Meanwhile, Qrow spends time with Ruby and Yang and Winter has tea with Weiss.

5.SummaryEnglish: Penny and Ciel Soleil fight against Team CRDL in the doubles round before Weiss and Yang battle against Flynt Coal and Neon Katt from Atlas' Team FNKI.

6.SummaryEnglish: Pyrrha is faced with a difficult decision. Meanwhile, the Vytal Festival Tournament proceeds to its singles match, with Yang and Mercury fighting in the first round.

7.SummaryEnglish: In a flashback, Cinder recruits Emerald and Mercury before confronting a powerful opponent.

8.SummaryEnglish: Yang is disqualified from the tournament and Pyrrha remains conflicted about Ozpin's offer.

9.SummaryEnglish: Pyrrha faces Penny in the singles round before things quickly start to fall apart.

10.SummaryEnglish: As the Grimm attack Beacon, Ruby rallies the other tournament teams to fight. Torchwick takes control of Ironwood's flagship.

11.SummaryEnglish: Ruby fights Neo and Torchwick as the rest of the students fight the hacked Paladins at the school.

12.SummaryEnglish: The attack continues. As Ruby rushes to help at the school, Cinder battles Ozpin before being confronted by Pyrrha.

1.SummaryEnglish: Six months after the Fall of Beacon, Ruby has set out for Mistral with Jaune, Nora, and Ren. Salem assigns her council and plots their next move.

2.SummaryEnglish: Team RNJR discovers the remains of a massacred town and Weiss is cornered by her father.

3.SummaryEnglish: Blake sails to Menagerie, but is interrupted by a Grimm attack.

4.SummaryEnglish: Yang struggles with confronting her fears and resuming training.

5.SummaryEnglish: Blake and Sun arrive in Kuo Kuana, the main city of Menagerie, and go to see Blake's parents.

6.SummaryEnglish: Weiss performs at the charity concert while Team RNJR comes across an abandoned town called Oniyuri.

7.SummaryEnglish: Oscar learns about his connection to Ozpin, Weiss faces the consequences of her actions, and Ruby joins Qrow in the fight against Tyrian.

8.SummaryEnglish: As night falls, Qrow explains to Team RNJR what they are truly fighting against. Blake repairs her relationship with her parents.

9.TitleEnglish: Two Steps Forward, Two Steps Back
9.SummaryEnglish: Yang and Weiss each complete their training and individually prepare to leave for Mistral. Meanwhile, Blake runs into an old acquaintance.

10.SummaryEnglish: Ren and Nora's past is revealed through a flashback.

11.SummaryEnglish: Cinder trains and Tyrian reels from his defeat. Yang, Weiss, and Blake each decide to take matters into their own hands.

12.SummaryEnglish: With Qrow incapacitated, Team RNJR is left to fight the Nuckelavee alone.

1.SummaryEnglish: Qrow and Team RNJR visit Professor Leonardo Lionheart to protect Haven's relic, which can only be accessed by the Spring Maiden. After Lionheart refuses Qrow's plan, Qrow is approached by Oscar, who identifies himself as Ozpin. The Belladonnas confront the Albains about the information from Ilia's scroll, but they blame Ilia. Blake decides to tell the public the information instead. Somewhere in Mistral, a man offers to lead Yang to Raven.

2.SummaryEnglish: Cinder is tasked with finding the Spring Maiden from Raven's tribe and use her to take Haven's relic. Meanwhile, Weiss' airship is attacked by Lancers, wasp-type Grimm. Weiss defends the airship from the open loading ramp and, by summoning her Armored Knight, kills their Queen. However, the airship still crashes in Lake Matsu. Weiss is found and apprehended by Raven's tribe of bandits. Adam meets with White Fang High Leader Sienna Khan, and, after a disagreement, fatally stabs her. He declares himself the new High Leader and orders his men to frame the humans for Sienna's assassination.

3.SummaryEnglish: Blake and her parents hold a press conference with the Faunus in Menagerie, rallying them to reclaim the White Fang by going to Mistral and help out the humans. Ilia publicly denounces the Belladonnas as traitors, swaying their trust in them. In Mistral, Ozpin, communicating through Oscar, explains that he is forced to reincarnate with different souls to defeat Salem. He predicts that she will attack Haven Academy in one month, and rather than depending on Lionheart, he decides to train the four and Oscar. Weiss awakens to find herself in captivity by bandits. Realizing Winter has since left for Atlas, Weiss summons a small Armored Knight to help her escape by herself.

4.SummaryEnglish: Yang tells Raven that she needs her Semblance, which allows her to create portals and teleport to people she's bonded with, to get to Ruby. Raven initially refuses, claiming that Ozpin is not to be trusted, but Weiss escapes her confinement with the help of her Armored Knight and reunites with Yang. Not wanting to attract Grimm, Raven agrees to Yang's demands and summons her and Weiss to her tent to tell them what they need to know.

5.SummaryEnglish: After the press conference, Blake and Sun fail to get signatures for their petition to save Haven Academy due to the Faunus in Menagerie wanting to avoid conflict. Despite knowing she will have to face Ilia, Blake hopes to save her from the White Fang. Ilia, however, is given orders by the Albains to orchestrate the assassination of Blake's parents and bring Blake alive to Adam.

6.SummaryEnglish: Raven explains to Yang and Weiss that she joined Beacon to fight back against other Huntsmen that would pose a threat to her tribe, but lost trust in Ozpin after learning about Salem's existence. She shows off her shapeshifting ability as proof and offers Yang a choice to stay with her. Yang and Weiss choose to leave and reunite with Ruby.

7.SummaryEnglish: The kids have a heartfelt reunion, and after dinner, Yang confronts Ozpin about using magic. Ozpin explains that he gave Qrow and Raven shapeshifting abilities to spy on Salem and the Maidens, as well as being the old man in the story that gave the Maidens their power. He offers them all the choice to continue to fight, which all of them accept. Meanwhile, Cinder, Watts, Mercury, and Emerald arrive at Raven's camp.

8.SummaryEnglish: Yang becomes upset when Ruby mentions Blake in the morning, but Weiss comforts her, asking her to trust Blake until she comes back. In Menagerie, Blake receives a note from Ilia to meet with her. The meeting becomes an ambush, and Sun rescues Blake from her captors. Blake and Sun rush to help her parents, who are defending their home from White Fang insurgents.

9.SummaryEnglish: Cinder strikes a deal with Raven and Vernal to help her unlock the relic. Despite knowing that Salem will have her killed anyway, Raven accepts her offer on the condition she kills Qrow, while secretly planning to use it as a distraction for taking the relic for herself. Blake and Sun defend Ghira, and while Blake is on her way to look for Kali, she is stopped by Ilia.

10.SummaryEnglish: Qrow receives a call from Lionheart while talking to Ozpin, but they are suspicious. As Blake and Ilia fight, Ilia becomes lost between following Blake and the White Fang. When the Albain brothers intervene, Fennec is killed and the Belladonnas and Sun are victorious in their battle. Blake convinces the Faunus of Menagerie that they need to stop Adam, and the majority join her, including Ilia.

11.SummaryEnglish: Qrow, Oscar/Ozpin, Ruby, and the rest of their group arrive at Haven to meet with Lionheart, but the meeting turns out to be a trap. Raven, Vernal, Cinder, Emerald, Mercury, and Hazel arrive to confront them, with the latter saying that the White Fang has also arrived as they prepare to destroy the school. Jaune attacks Cinder, seeking revenge Pyrrha. In the ensuing battle, Weiss is impaled by Cinder.

12.SummaryEnglish: Hazel becomes enraged at Ozpin and fights him to settle an old grudge. Jaune unlocks his Semblance and heals Weiss while Ruby and Yang hold off Emerald and Mercury. Upon entering the vault, Cinder fatally strikes Vernal to steal her powers. However, Raven reveals that she is the real Spring Maiden and prepares to fight Cinder for the Relic.

13.SummaryEnglish: Ruby distracts Emerald and Mercury long enough for Yang to pursue Raven and Cinder, while a recovered Weiss summons the Lancer Queen to defeat Hazel. Adam prepares to destroy the school, but Blake arrives with the rest of the Faunus to take him into custody. Raven defeats Cinder in a grueling battle and unlocks the relic, but is confronted by Yang before she can claim it.

14.SummaryEnglish: Yang denounces Raven and her actions, shaming her into fleeing. Emerald breaks down upon learning of Cinder's defeat while Adam and Lionheart flee, forcing Mercury and Hazel to retreat. Salem kills Lionheart for his cowardice, while Ghira reclaims leadership of the White Fang. Despite brief tension in Yang, Blake is welcomed back by RWBY as Ozpin directs them to make for Atlas. In a post-credits scene, Raven visits Taiyang in secret.

1.SummaryEnglish: Ruby Rose and her friends have been burdened with transporting the Relic of Knowledge safely to Atlas. There's countless miles of Grimm-covered countryside between the city of Mistral and the northern coastline of Anima. Fortunately, the Argus Limited can easily make the journey... so long as nothing goes wrong.

2.SummaryEnglish: No matter how hard you may try to bury it, the past will always claw its way back to you.

3.SummaryEnglish: What is your favorite fairy tale?

4.SummaryEnglish: Heroes and villains alike are confronted with troubling revelations.

5.SummaryEnglish: The spiders in Mistral always deliver, but shelter doesn't always guarantee safety.

6.SummaryEnglish: As darkness falls on Brunswick Farms and the snow continues to fall, Team RWBY's morale is at an all-time low. The only thing worse than being stranded, alone in the woods... is realizing you're not alone at all.

7.SummaryEnglish: While Cinder shares her plans with Neo, Maria shares her past with Team RWBY, and both groups are dead-set on making it to Atlas.

8.SummaryEnglish: The Atlas representatives in Argus have no intention of assisting Team RWBY. In fact, they're adamantly opposed to it. It's time to come up with a new solution... and it's time to tell Jaune, Nora, and Ren about Jinn.

9.SummaryEnglish: With Cinder gone, Emerald and Mercury are starting to raise questions, and they're not the only ones; Jaune, Nora, and Ren search for Oscar, but still aren't sure what they'll do if they find him.

10.SummaryEnglish: Our heroes have one shot to pull off the heist of their lives, and if they're going to succeed, they'll need everyone to do their part. It's go time.

11.SummaryEnglish: The only thing standing between our heroes and Atlas is Caroline Cordovin, but it will have to be a joint effort if they're going to bring her down. Meanwhile, Yang races to find Blake while Adam does his best to finish her.

12.SummaryEnglish: Our heroes are running out of time. As Cordovin continues to stand tall, Blake and Yang stand together, and all combatants must ask themselves, "How far am I willing to go to win?"

13.SummaryEnglish: A Leviathan has emerged from the ocean depths and now threatens to destroy the city of Argus. With Cordo's Colossus incapacitated, the Atlas Base has little they can do to protect the people.

1.SummaryEnglish: Our heroes have finally made it to Atlas, but are they truly as safe as they’d hoped? This shining city in the clouds may be a beacon of hope for Remnant, but it casts a dark shadow…

2.SummaryEnglish: Arresting people isn’t exactly the best way to make a first impression. However, once the initial shock has worn off, Ruby and her friends learn there’s a lot more to these Ace Ops - and even General Ironwood - than first meets the eye.

3.SummaryEnglish: Out in the snowy tundra, the Ace Ops show teams RWBY and JNR the ropes.

4.SummaryEnglish: Riding the high of completing their first mission in Atlas, the gang is itching to hone their skills and provide some much-needed help to the citizens of Mantle.

5.SummaryEnglish: Between missions, training, and rising political unrest, these fledgling huntsmen and huntresses have quite a lot on their hands.

6.SummaryEnglish: After constant missions and vigorous training sessions, the kids finally get a night off to relax! But attending a political rally may not be the most leisurely activity.

7.SummaryEnglish: How far would you be willing to go to do what's right?

8.SummaryEnglish: Jacques and Ironwood engage in a dangerous game of wits. Meanwhile, the kids must face their most dangerous threat yet: a high class dinner party.

9.SummaryEnglish: Will you tell the truth? Or will someone tell it for you? The answer can make all the difference in the world

10.SummaryEnglish: The truth is finally out, and it's not only our heroes who take notice. With everything at stake, it's all hands on deck to protect the City of Mantle!

11.SummaryEnglish: Between Watts, Tyrian, and the seemingly endless swarm of Grimm, evil is encroaching on our heroes from all sides. The biggest threat, however, may be hiding where they least expect it.

12.SummaryEnglish: With Salem's forces drawing closer, and the General's orders for their arrest, our heroes are forced to fight on all fronts to save the city Ironwood has abandoned.

13.SummaryEnglish: Who will you become when your greatest fears are realized?

1.SummaryEnglish: More than ever before, the allied forces standing against Salem need to be united. But after Ironwood refused to continue evacuating Mantle, our heroes need to choose a new path forward -- if only they could agree on one.

2.SummaryEnglish: Ruby, Nora, Blake, May, and Penny set their sights on Atlas Military Command. Meanwhile Yang, Ren, Jaune, and Oscar handle evacuations in Mantle. If they can get everyone to the crater in time, they just might be able to save them.

3.SummaryEnglish: The fate of humanity requires our heroes to infiltrate the most heavily-guarded facility in Atlas -- all in a day's work.

4.SummaryEnglish: Jaune, Ren, and Yang's pursuit of a mysterious new Grimm results in unexpected complications. Ruby, Weiss, and Blake find a new place to lay low. Cinder receives an ultimatum.

5.SummaryEnglish: This is it. Their chance to tell the world the truth. Will their message be heard?

7.SummaryEnglish: It's all out war in Atlas. Our heroes face an impossible problem. Where do they go from here?

9.SummaryEnglish: The clock is ticking on Jaune, Ren, and Yang's rescue mission. The Ace-Ops hold the line against Salem's forces.

10.SummaryEnglish: As the fog of war covers the kingdom, Atlas nears its breaking point.

11.SummaryEnglish: Tensions rise in Schnee Manor as our reunited heroes find themselves backed into a corner.

12.SummaryEnglish: It's risky, dangerous, and nearly impossible -- but it's the best plan they've got.

14.SummaryEnglish: Sometimes it's worth it all to risk the fall.

1.SummaryEnglish: In which a mysterious location is uncovered.

2.SummaryEnglish: In which Team RWBY gets more than they bartered for.

3.SummaryEnglish: In which the rules of a game are broken.

4.SummaryEnglish: In which new acquaintances are made.

5.SummaryEnglish: In which a dessert is assembled.

7.SummaryEnglish: In which plans and schedules are made.

8.SummaryEnglish: In which some tea is spilled.

9.SummaryEnglish: In which a door is encountered.

10.SummaryEnglish: In which a choice must be made.
